seo.meta_title: Nano Banana 提示词：中草药全景分解图生成器｜Curify AI
seo.meta_description: 使用专业 Nano Banana 提示词一键生成“单味药材全景分解图”：涵盖饮片结构、药性归经与科普信息图排版，适合内容创作。

sections.what: 这个模板通过优化的 Nano Banana 提示词把“单味中草药”做成一张可收藏的全景分解图：包含外观/断面细节、性味归经与核心功效标签，采用清晰的科普排版。
sections.who: 适合中医药科普账号、养生内容创作者、药材店/品牌做知识海报、学生做学习笔记，以及想把药材讲清楚（但不想写长文）的用户。
how: 输入药材中文名+别名（如有）+常见形态（饮片/原药材）。
给出你想强调的模块：性味归经/主功效/鉴别要点/禁忌注意/现代剂型（颗粒、胶囊等）。
要求“分解视图”：外观、断面、纹理、关键部位用箭头标注；信息密度高但要可读。
生成后校对：术语是否一致（归经、功效标签）；如偏差，要求“按你提供的要点重写文案，不改画面风格”。
prompts: 生成《单味药材全景分解图》：药材“黄芪”，包含外观与断面纹理标注、性味归经、核心功效标签、常见剂型与使用场景、注意事项，3:4竖版，高信息密度科普排版。
做“当归”Herb Exploded Sheet：饮片结构、鉴别要点（颜色/气味/断面）、主功效、搭配思路（可选）、禁忌提示，清晰箭头注释，3:4。
生成“陈皮”分解图：产地与年份差异要点、外观纹理特写、性味归经、日常使用场景（泡茶/入膳），复古但清爽的中文信息图排版，3:4。

seo.meta_title: Nano Banana Prompts: Pixel Evolution Museum Timeline Generator
seo.meta_description: Create stunning isometric pixel-art timelines with these Nano Banana prompts. Represent historical stages as museum halls with bilingual titles and rich detail.

sections.what: This template uses specific Nano Banana prompts to turn any timeline into an isometric pixel-art “museum walk-through,” where each hall represents a historical era with labeled exhibits and milestone plaques.
sections.who: Great for educators, history/science explainers, product teams showing version evolution, researchers presenting stage-by-stage change, and creators who want timelines that feel like a story space (not a list).
how: Pick a theme + time span (e.g., “human evolution”, “smartphone design”, “AI model releases”).
List 6–10 stages with a one-line key change + one signature artifact/icon per stage.
Ask for an isometric pixel museum: numbered halls, milestone plaques, clear typography, optional bilingual headings.
After generation, verify ordering and labels; if inconsistent, instruct: “keep the style, rearrange halls and milestone text only.”
prompts: Create an isometric pixel-art “Evolution Museum” timeline: Early Hominins → Homo habilis → Homo erectus → Neanderthals → Homo sapiens. Include exhibit icons, milestone plaques, and concise bilingual headings. Vertical 3:4.

Generate a “Smartphone Evolution Museum” timeline: feature phone → flip phone → early touchscreen → full-screen → foldables → AR glasses (concept). Each stage gets one iconic device silhouette + one key change. Vertical 3:4.
Make a “Web Framework Evolution Museum” timeline: jQuery → Backbone → Angular → React → Next.js → Server Components (concept). Add milestone markers and one-line takeaways. Vertical 3:4.
